job_text: ['Proficiency in CRM software, such as HubSpot and Zoho.', 'Advanced proficiency in English, additional languages would be advantageous.', 'Access to a telephone, computer, and reliable internet connection.', 'Proficiency in MS Word, Excel, and Outlook Express, as well as data entry.', 'Ability to comply with regulations and communicate official information in an appropriate manner.', 'Advanced ability to coordinate efforts, facilitate intervention, and maintain records.', 'Exceptional organizational skills and sound judgment.', 'Excellent interpersonal skills to assist distressed individuals from different cultural background', 'Coordinating contact tracing efforts with Supervisors and Case Investigators from the Local Health Department.', 'Conducting interviews in a professional manner that reflects emotional and cultural awareness.', 'Collecting and recording accurate information using Customer Relationship Management (CRM) software.', 'Calling newly diagnosed patients to trace individuals they had contact with and determining exposure.', 'Interviewing traced contacts, assessing symptoms, and referring them for testing.', 'Providing contacts with regulated information on isolation and quarantine procedures.', 'Collaborating with designated local authorities in supporting the isolation and quarantine of individuals.', 'Maintaining ongoing virtual communication to monitor symptoms.', 'Facilitating health checks and test, as well as referring contacts to available community resources.', 'Complying with all Health Department regulations, including those aimed at protecting personal information.']

job_title: Team Member (In Store Sales) Chula Vista
job_text: ['You will serve on a team whose job is to spread the mission of Bicycle Warehouse - inspiring our Guests passion to ride so they enjoy more freedom, fitness and fun', 'You will engage with all levels of cycling skills and goals from diverse Guests of Bicycle Warehouse', "You will expand the culture and success of Bicycle Warehouse by getting our Guests to ride more often and better equipped so it's more enjoyable.", 'You will become a trusted advisor to our Guests so they want to continue doing business with us along with referring their family and friends.', 'You will become an expert on all the features and benefits of all our product and how they benefit our Guests.', 'You will become an expert at selling all of our Bikes, Accessories, Clothing, Parts, Maintenance and Services.', 'You will learn and use our GEAR sales process with all Guests:', '"Greeting" - giving all of our Guests a warm and welcoming greeting into our store. Shaking their hand and introducing yourself', '"Editing" - learning what our Guests want and need by talking to them about what has them excited about riding or wanting a particular product', '"Appeal" - learning all of our product features and benefits and presenting the best product and service options so our Guests always have awesome riding experiences', '"Relationship" - establishing and improving our relationship with our Guests at every interaction. Inviting them to events, rides and back into the store. Following up with them to make sure they LOVE what they purchased. Thanking them for their business and asking for referrals.', 'You will keep our stores visually appealing with continual merchandising and cleaning.', 'You will learn and use our Service Check In process to help our Guests maintain their bikes at 100% so they always have an awesome ride.', 'You will use our core values to continually improve our Guest experiences: service, integrity, teamwork, improvement and fun.', 'You will learn and use all of our software resources - Point of sale, Relationship Management, Intranet, Website, Myagi Training, Zoho (several internal business apps)', "You will learn and use all of our services - financing, trade in's, warranties, Love It guarantee, returns, special orders, test rides, bike fitting, inventory transferring and more.", 'Raving Fans - when you do it right you will get great feedback from our Guests. They will Rave about the level of service they receive from you', 'Sales - when you do it right your sales will far exceed of your sales goal of $200 per hour', 'Personal Pay - better performance equals better pay.', "Referrals - when you do it right you get lot's of referrals from the Raving Fans you created", 'Cycling passion and experience - you have to ride a bike regularly and be totally passionate about it.', 'Selling experience - 2 years of selling and retail experience (or equivalent), something that translates easily to selling bikes, gear and service.', 'The ability to lift bicycles onto display racks above your head', 'The ability to stand on your feet for 8 hours a day on concrete floors', 'The ability to work a flexible schedule including weekends and evenings until 7:30pm', 'The ability to have fun and inspire others to ride their bik', "If you are just looking for a job, please do not apply. Sorry to be so blunt but it will save us both a bunch of time and effort if we part ways now versus learning it won't work out shortly down the road.", 'If you are looking for career oriented employment and it all sounds like a great fit for you, then we are excited to have you apply.', 'Base pay - $13-$15 per hour', 'Incentive pay', 'Sales over $200/hour earn 5% on parts, accessories, clothes and labor.', 'Team Bonus - each store has monthly sales goals. When the store hits their monthly goals each team member of the store earns an extra bonus.', 'Paid Time Off - each year you get 5 days of earned sick leave along with extra vacation days (up to 10 days total)', 'Purchase Discounts - be able to purchase your cycling product at great discounts.', 'Health Insurance - 50% paid by Bicycle warehouse', "ESOP (Employee Stock Ownership Plan) - basically it's a profit sharing program that allows the company to share a percentage of the profits with the vested team members."]

job_text: ['Meet or exceed revenue objectives for assigned region', 'Solicit and develop new business opportunities through direct calling efforts, referral sources, industry trade shows and conferences, and meetings; as well as any other appropriate means', 'Visit existing and former customers periodically to reaffirm satisfaction and identify new and expanding opportunities for deeper client engagement.', 'Develop new business plans for existing customers as well as potential new customersRespond to new business development leads promptly and coordinate / follow up with internal support team to ensure same', 'Qualify, pursue, and close new opportunities.Identify decision-makers and areas of need.Negotiate and close', 'Keep accurate records of calls, meetings and other activities (call reports) in CRM', 'Maintain an up to date pipeline of new business opportunities', 'Assist with preparing proposals, quotes, and customer contracts', 'Develop a comprehensive understanding of all services offered', 'Other duties as assigned by management.', 'Minimum of five years of demonstrated success in outside sales / business development in a scientific field.', 'Proven sales experience with a history of sustainable growth is a must.', 'Familiarity with GLP regulatory process. Prior experience in a GLP CRO is a plus.', 'Familiarity with drug development biology to include toxicology, metabolism, and pharmacokinetics.', 'Excellent organizational and planning skills', 'Ability to operate in an independent, self-directed manner', 'Good communication skills, including persuasive interpersonal communication and sales techniques to include presentation skills, sales interview skills, and closing skills.', 'Working knowledge of business office software (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook)', 'Working knowledge of CRM (Salesforce, Microsoft Dynamics, Zoho, or other)', 'BS required – biology, chemistry, or related', 'Must have a valid driver license.', 'Must have a functional home office setup.']

Someone who exhibits flexibility, enthusiasm, responsiveness, aptitude for details, a positive attitude, creativity, strategic and analytical thinking, self-motivation, attentiveness to cultural differences, and problem solving skills, as well as the ability to be proactive and to produce quality work under tight deadlines.', 'Strong organizational, communication, ability to take initiative and customer service skills required.', 'Strong technical skills and ability to adapt and/or learn quickly and independently required.', 'Strong commitment to client success and customer service experience required.']

job_title: Director of Marketing - Programs (171) Corporate Mercer
company: SERV Centers of New Jersey, Inc.
job_text: ['Maintains up-to-date knowledge of best practices and strategies of digital and traditional marketing', 'Develops and executes a strategic plan to increase client acquisitions;', 'Produces marketing materials (print and digital) to increase client acquisitions;', 'Leads and manages the performance of marketing campaigns for SERV Behavioral Health System programs;', 'Builds relationships with Care Management Organizations;', 'Analyzes and reports marketing performance;', 'Provides marketing training for executive management and employees;', 'Collaborates with and supports the Communications Department and other departments within the organization to generate client referrals;', 'Clearly communicates goals and areas of opportunity to management;', 'Leads ongoing Campaign optimization to include continuous improvement and commitment to achieving aggressive marketing goals', 'Additional duties as assigned or as needed to support departmental or organizational goals', 'Extensive, demonstrated expertise in organic, paid and traditional marketing tactics;', 'Comprehensive mastery of best practices and strategies of traditional and digital marketing;', 'Excellent written and communications skills;', 'Advanced knowledge of marketing tools such as Pardot and CRM systems such as Salesforce or Zoho;', 'Computer skills including Microsoft Office;', 'Creativity, maturity and strong interpersonal / presentation skills;', 'Ability to multi-task, prioritize competing demands and thrive in a fast-paced environment', 'Bachelor’s degree or higher in Marketing or related field', '5+ years marketing experience;', 'Experience in building large-scale marketing initiatives within a highly regulated Healthcare environment;', 'Experience in behavioral or mental health, or familiarity with intellectual and developmental disabilities is highly desired;', 'Exempt']

['You’ll join a small, collaborative, tight-knit B Corp with a big mission: equality for all.', 'You’ll have a high level of responsibility and ownership over impactful projects.', "You'll have direct access to our leadership team, with open lines of communication to discuss the role you play in our growing business.", "You'll attend and assist at all-hands-on-deck Ellevate events in NYC, a few times per quarter, after-work on weekdays; we adjust our flexible hours on other days to account for these longer evenings.", 'You’ll receive competitive benefits, like flexible work hours and locations, unlimited vacation time, 401(k) matching, generous parental leave, time off to volunteer, a wellness stipend, and more.', "You'll receive full access to Ellevate Network’s resources, speakers, events, and content.", 'You’ll work from our brand new office with bottomless snacks, cold brew, wine, and more.', 'El(l)evate the overall client experience.', 'Operate as the lead point of contact for any and all matters specific to assigned corporate partners.', 'Drive engagement of the Ellevate partnership. You’re our champion. You’ll develop strong, long-lasting relationships as a trusted advisor.', 'Oversee the onboarding experience and training for new clients, and then work with them to ensure they are leveraging the partnership effectively and using best practices.', 'Liaise with Ellevate HQ and Global Chapters leaders.', 'Track and report on client health, as well as proactively identifying engagement trends in order to uncover renewal risks and identify areas of upsell opportunities.', 'Ensure all partnerships are meeting clients’ needs and objectives.', 'Provide a world-class support experience by handling clients with grace and confidence', 'Working interdepartmentally with our marketing, membership, product, and tech teams to communicate customer feedback and collaboratively improve our product and service.', 'Invest heavily in the team, grow and find success in the job by learning from one another’s experiences, and actively work to improve.', "You're collaborative - able to work independently or on a team.", "You're quick on your feet - you know when to be scrappy and when to invest and stop cutting corners.", "You're an effective communicator with team members and external users. You enjoy working with a variety of different personalities and with people from different backgrounds-- from young professionals to C-suite executives.", 'You’re flexible, patient, and able to adapt to a changing environment.', "You're persevering and excited to contribute to our mission.", 'You can present in an effective, actionable, and confident manner.', 'You strongly believe that diversity is an asset.', 'You consider yourself energetic, self-motivated, detail-oriented, and enthusiastic, with strong interpersonal skills and high emotional intelligence.', '2+ years in relationship building or a client facing role like Client Services or Account Management.', 'High proficiency in Microsoft Office (Excel, Word, Powerpoint), Canva, and Keynote.', 'Experience working with Salesforce, Zoho or other CRM and marketing software.', 'Experience dealing with multiple issues at a time, excellent time management, and prioritization skills.', 'Excellent written and oral communications skills.', 'Solid organizational skills, detail oriented.', 'A patient and professional demeanor, positive attitude.', 'Flexible Work Hours & Locations - primarily during business hours Monday-Friday in Manhattan, with ability to work remotely as needed.', 'Unlimited Vacation Time.', 'Health, vision, and dental insurance.', 'Parental leave policy.', 'Retirement savings plan (401k).', 'Time off to volunteer.', 'Annual wellness reimbursement.', 'Access to Ellevate’s resources, speakers, events, and content.', 'Beautiful office with snacks, cold brew, wine, etc.']

['This position offers health, dental and vision insurance.', 'Seven paid holidays off per year', 'Paid Vacation', 'IHG operates 5,367 hotels with 800,000 rooms and offers greatly discounted employee room rates!', 'One year of hotel sales experience with a focus-service or a full-service brand preferably with an IHG branded hotel.', 'A college degree, or previous hotel management experience can be substituted for the sales experience requirement.', 'Work together with the General Manager to ensure top-line revenue goals are achieved on a monthly basis.', 'Collaborate with the General Manager, Brand Revenue Manager and Director of Revenue to establish rate guidelines for transient, corporate account and group rates.', 'Conduct proactive phone, outside, and creative site tour solicitations each week and achieve the monthly goal.', 'Meet and exceed the monthly booking and consumption goal.', 'Enter all solicitations into ZOHO our Customer Relations Management (CRM) tool.', 'Create and execute the quarterly sales action plan.', 'Answer online and telephone sales leads within 8 hours.', 'Work with the IHG National Sales Team to gain room nights from accounts managed by the brand.', 'Valid drivers license.', 'Reliable transportation.', 'Proficiency in Microsoft Office.', 'Ability to work nights on occasion if needed, to meet with clients.', 'Ability to multi-task.', 'Ability to attend mixers and breakfasts which may occur outside standard working hours.', 'Strong organizational and follow-up skills.', 'Proven ability to negotiate and overcome objections and close business.', 'Ability to sell value vs. discounting rate.', 'Ability to determine the strengths and weaknesses of area focus-service hotels, sell against the competition, and shift share to the Holiday Inn Express Toledo North.']

['Objective (why does the role exist)', 'Key Result (how does the role contribute to our mission)', 'Key Result (how will it be measured)', 'Activator...you have grit, determination and take initiative, you are not afraid to hunt for leads and opportunities.', 'Connector with the ability to listen and build relationships to guide customer interactions.', 'Competitive, but also a team player who is able to thrive in a fast-paced environment!', 'Resilient and positive...you can take several no’s to get to a yes and stay positive in the journey...you practice the power of positive thinking!', 'Daily Execution and Follow-Through are your jam. You know that every moment matters and daily wins roll to weekly wins roll to monthly and quarterly wins.', 'Schedule and lead online meetings and present demonstrations of RevolutionParts platform to prospective customers.', 'Uncover customer needs and present the proper solution by demonstrating knowledge of RevolutionParts offerings and value propositions.', 'Negotiate and close deals with new customers, while setting the correct expectations for successful onboarding meeting or exceeding monthly quota and sales KPIs.', 'Collaborate with Implementation, Account Management and Customer Success teams to creating a great customer experience.', 'Constantly learn and improve to contribute to a winning team where we are all in it together.', '2+ years of Inside sales experience', 'Experience with using a CRM (Salesforce, Hubspot, ZoHo, etc…)', 'A proven track record of meeting and exceeding assigned metrics', 'Knowledge of and/or prior experience selling SaaS', 'Previous E-Commerce experience', 'This role has the opportunity to grow into key account sales, enterprise sales, or business development.', 'Benefits of course, including health, vision (FREE), dental, 401K, gym reimbursement and more….', 'A family feel environment with generous maternity and paternity leave', 'Paid Holidays, 11 of them every year', 'Flexible PTO- Take it When You Need It', 'Recognition and Rewards for a job well done', 'Casual Dress where Jeans are welcome', 'The opportunity to make a difference in a fast-growth startup environment with potential for growth', 'A fun and focused atmosphere where we think big and own it together', 'A great space with food...lots of food']

company: DHA Housing Solutions for North Texas
job_text: ['Work with senior leadership to understand data and to incorporate applications into daily work processes;', 'Perform various spatial and statistical analyses pertaining to residential living patterns, accessibility to resources, as well as operational efficiency and performance as designated by senior leadership;', 'Lead the development of technological communications between various software used by DHA; including third-party apps, CRM systems, and real estate/property management tracking software (i.e., Yardi);', 'Expand and develop Zoho CRM functionalities including workflow automation, Advanced Analytics dashboards, CRM integration, and Zoho Artificial Intelligence/Zoho Deluge;', 'Develop statistical forecast models to help understand the needs of DHA families and clients to better assist with service provision;', 'Support research endeavors with current and future academic partners through research design, data analysis, and implementation;', 'Critically evaluate and oversee DHA’s AI projects as designated by senior leadership;', 'Demonstrate initiative and entrepreneurial leaning by providing expert/technical insight on on-going PD&R initiatives and recommendations for operational enhancement;', 'Provide accurate and routine technical and non-technical updates on projects to designated internal and external audiences;', 'Assist PD&R Leadership with the creation, collection, evaluation, analysis and distribution of information for meetings with the DHA Board of Commissioners, City Council, HUD and others, conveying DHA initiatives’ design and performance;', 'Build relationships with thought leaders to grow industry and issue awareness;', 'Assist with the development and maintenance of DHA website and functionalities;', 'Maintain absolute confidentiality of work-related issues, client records and DHA information;', 'Support the relationship between DHA and the constituent population by demonstrating courteous and cooperative behavior when interacting with clients, visitors, and DHA staff;', 'Enthusiastically promote the President/CEO’s priorities for the operations of DHA;', 'Performs other duties as assigned or required.', 'Advanced knowledge of programming languages including but not limited to Python, R, Java, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, SQL;', 'Advanced knowledge of Python Web and AI libraries including but not limited to Flask, Matplotlib, SciPy, Plotly, Numpy, Pandas, XGBoost, Scikit-Learn;', 'Advanced knowledge of Software tools included but not limited to Microsoft, Excel, ArcGIS, Docker, Git/Github, Linus/Unix, Nginx, Gunicorn, SQLite, MySQL, Wordpress;', 'Experience in quantitative analysis or technical field required (e.g. data science, applied analytics, econometrics, mathematics, engineering, etc.);', 'Experience in funded research projects in the field of Engineering and/or Housing/Public Policy;', 'A Masters or PhD in Data Science, Engineering, Applied Analytics, and at least 2 years of full-time relevant professional experience in Applied Research fields related to this position;', 'Working knowledge in planning, housing, and public policy with several years of experience in fair housing research;', 'An understanding of issues relating to housing, transportation, segregation and poverty in a large urban setting, with knowledge of the North Texas landscape;', 'Excellent task management, information management, and organizational skills, as well as impeccable writing, copyediting, and proofreading skills;', 'Ability to gain the support of independent stakeholders;', 'Willingness to work as part of a team environment, and adapts well to change;', 'Knowledge of DHA organization, operations, policies and procedures;', 'Government work experience; or relevant technical, consulting or business background is a plus;', 'Willingness to travel or work after hours, as required;', 'Skill in establishing cooperative working relationships with employees and the general public;', 'Skill in effective communication, both verbal and written;', 'Skill in interacting with people of different social, economic, and ethnic backgrounds.']

['Primary Responsibility. Lead a residential sales team of Account Executives to develop and secure residential in-home sales through-out Southern California. job_text: ["Strategy. Mobilize strategy for strategic initiative (STI) planning, execution, and deployment. This is both for long range STI's and short term projects, as well as foundational investments. For an assigned functional area (e.g,. Sales), contribute and govern the portfolio of HMHS work including proposal development, customer communications, work estimates analysis/evaluation, and regular engagement with HMHS staff and business leadership around deliverables and statements of work. Foster and maintain integrated partnerships with HMHS (IT) and Consulting services counterparts and leadership as well as Health Plan executives and directors.", 'Leadership. Define structured professional development including mentorship, formal training, templates, and best practices in the area of project management and consulting. In managing complex projects and initiatives on behalf of the Health Plan for a department or functional area, build, share, and maintain expertise in both IT components as well as the business environment and external marketplace. Regularly interface with business leaders, Operational, and Product leaders, alongside HMHS senior consulting staff peers to help HMHS deliver on customer commitments. Collaborate with business leadership team on the strategic alignment of how HMHS affects operational and business (customer) needs. Lead cross functional teams to deliver on complex capabilities that the marketplace demands, owning bottom line accountability for business engagement with new/fixed/enhanced capabilities.', 'Operations. Work with HMHS practice and delivery leads to write the business requirements to be translated into technical requirements. Identify process improvement opportunities from technical issues that arise. Work with business leadership to address root causes, driving and overseeing recommended changes and process improvements. Collaborate with business leadership on the development of business cases, with aligned ROI, for future STI funded work that is over 500 hours. Ability to "roll up sleeves" and actively deliver and troubleshoot HMHS engagement opportunities, develop executive level communication strategies on high complex and escalated issues. Direct HMHS project teams in their interactions with business leaders and external clients, including matrixed/cross-functional teams.', 'Communications. Communicate with HMHS peers as enhancements/projects are scoped, developed, and delivered to ensure that HMHS teams have clear direction and proper inputs required to deliver solutions for the Health Plan. Communicate with HMHS senior consultants and solutioning and delivery leads to ensure that technical issues are properly defined as enhancements, defects, routine maintenance, etc. in order to drive timely resolution in a cost-effective manner. Provide regular status reporting on all tickets to business leadership, identifying tickets which require executive leadership influence to affect outcomes. Strategically plan communications to Health Plan business stakeholders on new initiatives and capabilities to ensure proper engagement and adoption.', 'Project Management. Regularly monitor the volume, duration, and severity of tickets submitted by assigned department / functional area, collaborating with HMHS peer senior consultants and escalating where needed. Work with business leaders (Director, VP and SVP) to appropriately analyze and prioritize/rank enhancements for approval. Communicate and escalate enhancements requiring VP level approval. Monitor and maintain enhancement hours and budget. Monitor and manage service level performance between HMHS and Health Plan business area.', 'Other duties as assigned.', "Bachelor's Degree in Business Administration/Management or General Studies", '6 years of experience in consulting and/or relevant business experience in the fields of IT, health insurance, Sales and/or Operations in lieu of degree', "Master's Degree in Business Administration/Management", '5 - 7 years in Communications, in a Business Analyst role or in the Health Insurance Industry', '3 - 5 years in Consulting', '1 - 3 years in IS/IT', '1 - 3 years in Operational Excellence', '0 - 1 years in Sales Account Management', '0 - 1 years in Sales Support', '0 - 1 years in Leadership', 'Prior Managed Care, Medicare, Healthcare Systems Microsoft Dynamics, Zoho or AgentCubed', 'Experience developing integrated system architectures comprising of CRM, web portals, telephony and associated sub-systems', 'Excellent functional and user acceptance testing experience', 'Experience developing sales process workflows and business rules', 'None', "Producer's License - Accident & Health", 'Analysis of business problems/needs', 'Analytical and Logical Reasoning/Thinking', 'Strategic Thinking', 'Health Insurance', 'Communication Skills', 'IT Industry', 'Operations', 'Leadership', 'Creativity Skills', 'Sales']

job_text: ['Work with senior leadership to understand data and to incorporate applications into daily work processes;', 'Perform various spatial and statistical analyses pertaining to residential living patterns, accessibility to resources, as well as operational efficiency and performance as designated by senior leadership;', 'Lead the development of technological communications between various software used by DHA; including third-party apps, CRM systems, and real estate/property management tracking software (i.e., Yardi);', 'Expand and develop Zoho CRM functionalities including workflow automation, Advanced Analytics dashboards, CRM integration, and Zoho Artificial Intelligence/Zoho Deluge;', 'Develop statistical forecast models to help understand the needs of DHA families and clients to better assist with service provision;', 'Support research endeavors with current and future academic partners through research design, data analysis, and implementation;', 'Critically evaluate and oversee DHA’s AI projects as designated by senior leadership;', 'Demonstrate initiative and entrepreneurial leaning by providing expert/technical insight on on-going PD&R initiatives and recommendations for operational enhancement;', 'Provide accurate and routine technical and non-technical updates on projects to designated internal and external audiences;', 'Assist PD&R Leadership with the creation, collection, evaluation, analysis and distribution of information for meetings with the DHA Board of Commissioners, City Council, HUD and others, conveying DHA initiatives’ design and performance;', 'Build relationships with thought leaders to grow industry and issue awareness;', 'Assist with the development and maintenance of DHA website and functionalities;', 'Maintain absolute confidentiality of work-related issues, client records and DHA information;', 'Support the relationship between DHA and the constituent population by demonstrating courteous and cooperative behavior when interacting with clients, visitors, and DHA staff;', 'Enthusiastically promote the President/CEO’s priorities for the operations of DHA;', 'Performs other duties as assigned or required.', 'Advanced knowledge of programming languages including but not limited to Python, R, Java, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, SQL;', 'Advanced knowledge of Python Web and AI libraries including but not limited to Flask, Matplotlib, SciPy, Plotly, Numpy, Pandas, XGBoost, Scikit-Learn;', 'Advanced knowledge of Software tools included but not limited to Microsoft, Excel, ArcGIS, Docker, Git/Github, Linus/Unix, Nginx, Gunicorn, SQLite, MySQL, Wordpress;', 'Experience in quantitative analysis or technical field required (e.g. data science, applied analytics, econometrics, mathematics, engineering, etc.);', 'Experience in funded research projects in the field of Engineering and/or Housing/Public Policy;', 'A Masters or PhD in Data Science, Engineering, Applied Analytics, and at least 2 years of full-time relevant professional experience in Applied Research fields related to this position;', 'Working knowledge in planning, housing, and public policy with several years of experience in fair housing research;', 'An understanding of issues relating to housing, transportation, segregation and poverty in a large urban setting, with knowledge of the North Texas landscape;', 'Excellent task management, information management, and organizational skills, as well as impeccable writing, copyediting, and proofreading skills;', 'Ability to gain the support of independent stakeholders;', 'Willingness to work as part of a team environment, and adapts well to change;', 'Knowledge of DHA organization, operations, policies and procedures;', 'Government work experience; or relevant technical, consulting or business background is a plus;', 'Willingness to travel or work after hours, as required;', 'Skill in establishing cooperative working relationships with employees and the general public;', 'Skill in effective communication, both verbal and written;', 'Skill in interacting with people of different social, economic, and ethnic backgrounds.']

job_title: Senior Business Development & Sales Manager – Speech Technology
job_text: ['Driving and delivering sales for the SPEAR product line, including development of new opportunities both within current customers and hunting for new customers with lead development in new and existing vertical markets.', 'Generate, manage and prioritize an end-to-end sales pipeline in order to exceed sales targets and assist the business in hitting its broader financial targets.', 'Manage the entire sales cycle including the technical aspects – with the support of the engineering team.', 'Follow up on inbound leads and targeted outbound account-based marketing programs with effective voice mail and email messaging.', 'Conduct pre-call and pre-product demonstration research to deliver a targeted pitch to prospects.', 'Provide subject matter expertise to prospects to solve business challenges with technology.', 'Present speech technology solutions and business cases to prospects to schedule and conduct product demonstrations (supported by solutions engineer).', 'Key requirement is to be able to write comprehensive proposals for both government and industry opportunities. Must be able to include and edit technical sections.', 'Make measurable, weekly progress to move multiple opportunities into the top of the sales funnel.', 'Qualify prospects to identify need, timeline, budget, buying timeframe while identifying and building relationships with key stakeholders.', 'Build and maintain trust & rapport with current and potential clients.', 'Maintain a deep understanding of TAM’s competitive products and services in order to evangelize TAM’s SPEAR vision and value proposition.', 'Build and maintain a thorough knowledge of the market, industry trends, the solutions/ services the company can provide, and the competitive landscape.', 'Ensure that data is accurately entered and managed within the company’s CRM system to ensure robust and accurate pipeline management and forecasting.', 'Provide feedback via company communications and CRM systems (i.e. ZOHO) regarding competitor offerings.', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Business Information Systems, Marketing, Communications or similar field or equivalent work with 4+ years’ experience required.', 'Experience selling complex technical solutions (primarily software) within the speech technology or similar industry, to a range of different stakeholders in commercial and government markets.', 'Proficiency in identifying and effectively pursing new customer prospects.', 'Proven ability to close commercial deals, maintain an accurate forecast, and exceed sales targets.', 'Strong team player who will collaborate well with other teams including product, solution engineers, developers, project managers, and marketing.', 'Highly developed and effective customer-focused written and spoken communication skills, including presentation, first-contact, and effective follow up.', 'Ability to operate in a fast-moving environment.', 'Experience with speech recognition technology highly preferred.', 'Proficiency with web applications such as Microsoft 365 suite (excel, word, ppt), LinkedIn, CRM.', 'SaaS selling experience a plus.', 'Experience and familiarity in conducting business using web conferencing tools.', 'Demonstrated success working with minimal direct daily supervision in an office or a remote office setting.', 'Some travel may be required for prospect/customer visits, industry events, corporate meetings.']
